content: I think I'll go with the idea of using scarves and hats to add pops of color. My mom has some beautiful scarves in different colors that we can use, and my siblings and I can wear hats in different colors to add some fun to the photos. We can also bring some balloons in bright colors to add a playful touch. What do you think about using a sign or banner with our family name or a special message? Would that be too cheesy or over-the-top?
